answerText: general relativity [or GR; prompt on "relativity"][10] This quantity found in the Einstein equations represents the vacuum energy density of space. Its value is thought to be positive because of the observed accelerating expansion of the universe.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Editors 2 | 1 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The Einstein field equations are central to this theory. For 10 points each: [10] Name this theory of gravitation that predicts phenomena like gravitational lensing.
